subject: Golf
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Derrick Fujikawa, the father of the teenage professional golfer Tadd Fujikawa, pleaded guilty to two counts of second-degree methamphetamine trafficking in a Honolulu courtroom. He faces at least one year and as many as 10 years for each count.
snippet: Derrick Fujikawa, the father of the teenage professional golfer Tadd Fujikawa, pleaded guilty to two counts of second-degree methamphetamine trafficking in a Honolulu courtroom. He faces at least one year and as many as 10 years for each count.
